name: heavy-frame-organizer
description: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing frames.

scripts.watch: pug --watch src/ui.pug --out dist/ && sass --watch src/styles.sass dist/styles.css && coffee -w -o dist/ src/
scripts.build: pug src/ui.pug --out dist/ && sass src/styles.sass dist/styles.css && coffee -c -o dist/ src/ && node dist/build.js && node play-sound.js
